thread.title: Sleeping in the sky.
thread.title_full: Sleeping in the sky. - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: hgprime
title: Sleeping in the sky.
text:
The rooms are small but adorable. I loved the shower. And the bed was so comfortable I was tempted to steal the pillows. I never slept better. It's a short walk from Penn Station, but far enough to not be surrounded by the normal high traffic noise of such a busy area.
Room Tip: Go for the sky rooms. See more room tips
